anya-e0902n0:5_1: paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā dīghanikāyaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ kiṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:6_1: paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā dīghanikāyaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ majjhimaṃ nāma nikāyaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:7_1: majjhimanikāyo nāma āvuso mūlapaṇṇāsako majjhima paṇṇāsako uparipaṇṇāsakoti paṇṇāsakavasena tividho,
anya-e0902n0:8_1: tīsu bhante paṇṇāsakesu mūlapaṇṇāsakaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ dhammasaṃgāhakā mahātheravarā paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:9_1: mūlapaṇṇāsakepi āvuso pañcavaggā paṇṇāsa ca suttāni,
anya-e0902n0:9_2: tesu kataraṃ vaggaṃ katarañca suttaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:10_1: mūlapaṇṇāsake bhante pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamaṃ mūlapariyāyavaggaṃ paṇṇāsakesu ca suttesu paṭhamaṃ mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:11_0: Sādhu āvuso mayampi dāni tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṃgītipubbaṅgamāni pucchāvissajjanakiccāni kātuṃ samārabhāma.
anya-e0902n0:13_1: tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:14_1: ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ bhante pañcasate brāhmaṇakulā pabbajite ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:14_2: pañcasatā bhante brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā bhikkhū pariyattiṃ nissāya mānaṃ uppādesuṃ,
anya-e0902n0:15_0: Pucchā – taṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā katihi vārehi katihi ca antogadhapadehi vibhajitvā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:16_1: taṃ pana bhante mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ bhagavatā aṭṭhahi ca vārehi catuvīsatiyā ca antogadhapadehi vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:18_0: Pucchā – dutiyaṃ panāvuso sabbāsavasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:19_0: Vissajjanā – sabbāsavasuttaṃ pana bhante bhagavatā sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:20_0: Pucchā – tatthāvuso bhagavatā āsavā katihi pakārehi vibhajitvā dassitā.
anya-e0902n0:21_0: Vissajjanā – sattahi bhante pakārehi vibhajitvā āsavā bhagavatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:23_0: Pucchā – dhammadāyādasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:24_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:24_2: bhagavato ca bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tadā mahālābhasakkāro udapādi,
anya-e0902n0:25_2: tesu paṭhame anusandhimhi kathaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0902n0:26_1: paṭhame bhante anusandhimhi dhammadāyādā me bhikkhave bhavatha mā āmisadāyādā,
anya-e0902n0:26_3: kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ no āmisadāyādāti evamādinā bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0902n0:27_0: Dhammadāyādā me bhikkhave bhavatha mā āmisadāyādā,
anya-e0902n0:27_1: atthi me tumhesu anukampā kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0902n0:28_1: dutiye panāvuso anusandhimhi āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā kīdisī dhammadesanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:29_1: dutiye pana bhante anusandhimhi āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā satthu pavivittassa viharato
anya-e0902n0:29_2: sāvakānaṃ vivekaṃ ananusikkhataṃ tīhi ṭhānehi gārayutaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:29_4: soḷasa ca pāpake dhamme tesañca pahānāya majjhimā paṭipadā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:31_0: Pucchā – bhayabheravasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:32_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:32_2: jāṇussoṇi bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “ye me bho gotama kulaputtā bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ
anya-e0902n0:33_2: bhoto ca pana gotamassa sā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjatī”ti,
anya-e0902n0:35_0: Pucchā – anaṅgaṇasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:36_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:38_0: Pucchā – ākaṅkheyyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:39_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:41_0: Pucchā – vatthasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:42_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:44_0: Pucchā – sallekhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:45_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ mahācundaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:45_2: āyasmā mahācundo bhante bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “yā imā bhante anekavihitā diṭṭhiyo loke uppajjanti,
anya-e0902n0:45_4: ādimeva nu kho bhante bhikkhuno manasikaroto evametāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ pahānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0902n0:46_0: Pucchā – tattha ca āvuso kati pariyāyā kati ca antogadhapadāni bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:47_1: tattha bhante pañca pariyāyā catucattālīsa ca antogadhapadāni bhagavatā vitthārena bhāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:49_0: Pucchā – sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:50_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:52_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0902n0:56_1: mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ panāvuso yogāvacarānaṃ bahupakārattā dīghanikāye ca idha cāti dvīsu nikāyesu porāṇakehi
anya-e0902n0:56_3: taṃ amhehi dīghanikāye yathānuppattavasena pucchitañca vissajjitañca.
anya-e0902n0:56_4: Tathāpi yogāvacarānaṃ bahupakārattāyeva taṃ idānipi yathānuppattavasena puna pucchissāmi,
anya-e0902n0:56_5: taṃ panetaṃ āvuso mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:57_0: Vissajjanā – kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṃ nigame sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:58_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha ānāpānassati kāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:59_1: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
anya-e0902n0:59_2: ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā so satova assasati,
anya-e0902n0:59_6: evamādinā bhante tattha ānāpānassati kāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:60_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha iriyāpathakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:61_1: puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu gacchanto vā gacchāmīti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:61_5: evamādinā bhante bhagavatā iriyāpathakāyānupassanā bhāvanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:62_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha sampajaññakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:63_1: puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hoti,
anya-e0902n0:63_5: asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti,
anya-e0902n0:63_7: gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti,
anya-e0902n0:63_8: evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha sampajaññakāyānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:64_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha paṭikūlamanasikārakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:65_1: puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa
anya-e0902n0:65_2: asucino paccavekkhati atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesālomā nakhā dantā taco evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0902n0:66_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha dhātumanasikārakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:67_1: puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ dhātuso paccavekkhati atthi imasmiṃ
anya-e0902n0:67_2: kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu evamādinā bhante bhagavatā dhātumanasikārakāyānupassanā
anya-e0902n0:68_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha nava sivathikakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:69_1: puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ ekāhamataṃ vā dvīhamataṃ
anya-e0902n0:69_2: vā tīhamataṃ vā uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakajātaṃ so imameva kāyaṃ upasaṃharati “ayampi kho kāyo
anya-e0902n0:69_3: evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā nava sivathikakāyānupassanā bhāvanā
anya-e0902n0:70_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha vedanānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:71_1: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sukhaṃ vā vedanaṃ vedayamāno “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:71_2: dukkhaṃ vā vedanaṃ vedayamāno “dukkha vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:71_3: adukkhamasukhaṃ vā vedanaṃ vedayamāno “adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:71_4: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā vedanānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:72_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha cittānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:73_1: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ “sarāgaṃ citta”nti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:73_3: sadosaṃ vā vītadosaṃ vā samohaṃ vā vītamohaṃ vā saṃkhittaṃ vā cittaṃ “saṃkhittaṃ citta”nti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:73_5: evamādinā tattha bhagavatā cittānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:74_1: kathañcāvuso tattha dhammānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitā,
anya-e0902n0:75_1: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati,
anya-e0902n0:75_2: pañcasu nīvaraṇesu evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā pañcahi pabbehi dhammānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:77_0: Pucchā – cūḷanasīhanādasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:78_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante parihīnalābhasakkāre nānātitthiye ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:78_2: nānātitthiyā bhante parihīnalābhasakkārā tesu tesu ṭhānesu parideviṃsu,
anya-e0902n0:78_3: catasso ca bhante parisā bhagavato ekamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ,
anya-e0902n0:80_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:81_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante sunakkhattaṃ licchaviputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:81_2: sanukkhatto bhante licchaviputto acirapakkanto hoti imasmā dhammavinayā,
anya-e0902n0:81_3: so vesāliyaṃ parisati evaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati “natthi samaṇassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso,
anya-e0902n0:81_4: takkapariyāhataṃ samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ deseti vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃ paṭibhānaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:81_5: Yassa ca khvāssa atthāya dhammo desito,
anya-e0902n0:81_7: etamatthaṃ bhante āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato ārocesi,
anya-e0902n0:82_1: kati panāvuso tattha bhagavatā tathāgatassa tathāgatabalāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni,
anya-e0902n0:82_2: yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
anya-e0902n0:83_1: dasa bhante tathāgatassa tathāgatabalāni bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitāni,
anya-e0902n0:83_2: yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
anya-e0902n0:84_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā catuverajjañāṇāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni,
anya-e0902n0:84_2: yehi vesārajjehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
anya-e0902n0:85_1: khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ime āsavā aparikkhīṇāti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro
anya-e0902n0:85_2: vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ sahadhammena paṭicodessatīti nimittametaṃ sāriputta na samanupassāmi,
anya-e0902n0:85_3: etamahaṃ sāriputta nimittaṃ asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmi.
anya-e0902n0:85_4: Evamādinā bhante tattha catuvesārajjañāṇāni bhagavatā vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:86_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā pañcagatiparicchedañāṇaṃ vibhajitvā pakāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:87_4: evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṃ vibhajitvā pakāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:88_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha tathāgato attano paññāveyyattiyā aparihāniṃ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:89_1: santi kho pana sāriputta eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino yāvadevāyaṃ bhavaṃ puriso daharo hoti,
anya-e0902n0:89_2: evamādinā bhante tattha tathāgato attano paññāveyyattiyā aparihāniṃ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:91_0: Pucchā – mahādukkhakkhandhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:92_2: sambahulā bhante aññatitthiyā bhikkhū etadavocuṃ “samaṇo āvuso gotamo kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapeti,
anya-e0902n0:92_4: samaṇo āvuso gotamo rūpānaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapeti,

anya-e0902n0:94_0: Pucchā – cūḷadukkhakkhandhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0902n0:95_2: mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “dīgharattāhaṃ bhante bhagavatā evaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi ‘lobho cittassa upakkileso,

anya-e0902n0:97_0: Pucchā – anumānasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0902n0:100_0: Pucchā – cetokhilasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0902n0:103_0: Pucchā – vanapatthasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:104_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:106_0: Pucchā – madhupiṇḍikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:107_1: sakkesu bhante daṇḍapāṇiṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:107_2: daṇḍapāṇi bhante sakko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “kiṃ vādī samaṇo kimakkhāyī”ti,
anya-e0902n0:109_0: Pucchā – dvedhāvitakkasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:110_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:112_0: Pucchā – vitakkasaṇṭhānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:113_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:115_2: sammāsambuddhena kakacūpamasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:116_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ moḷiyaphaggunaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:116_2: āyasmā bhante moḷiyaphagguno bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ ativelaṃ saṃsaṭṭho viharati,
anya-e0902n0:117_1: atha kho āvuso āyasmato moḷiyaphaggunassa taṃ bhagavato ovādaṃ sutvā kathaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:118_1: atha kho bhante moḷiyaphaggunassa bhagavato imaṃ ovādaṃ sutvā bhikkhunisaṃsaggato oramissāmi viramissāmītipi cittaṃ na uppannaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:118_3: bhagavā ca bhante ārādhayiṃsu vata me bhikkhave bhikkhū ekaṃ samayaṃ cittaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:119_0: Ubhato daṇḍakena cepi bhikkhave kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okanteyyuṃ.
anya-e0902n0:121_0: Pucchā – alagaddūpamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:122_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:122_2: ariṭṭhassa bhante bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājādāmi,
anya-e0902n0:122_3: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā,
anya-e0902n0:123_1: atha kho āvuso āyasmato ariṭṭhassa gaddhabādhipubbassa kathaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi,
anya-e0902n0:123_2: kathañca bhagavā uttari bhikkhunaṃ dhammadesanaṃ pavattesi.
anya-e0902n0:124_1: atha kho bhante ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa “kiñcāpi maṃ bhagavā moghapurisavādena vadesi,
anya-e0902n0:124_2: na kho pana me maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo na hoti,
anya-e0902n0:124_4: evaṃ kho bhante cetaso parivitakko udapādi,
anya-e0902n0:124_5: bhagavā ca bhante duppaññassa alagaddūpamaṃ dassetvā alagaddūpamaṃ pariyattiñca dassetvā paññavato alagaddūpamāya
anya-e0902n0:124_6: ca kullūpamāya ca paññavato nissaraṇapariyattiṃ dassetvā cha ca diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni,
anya-e0902n0:124_7: tesañca channaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānānaṃ viniveṭhanākāraṃ dassetvā pariyosāne ca khandhakammaṭṭhānaṃ arahattanikūṭena
anya-e0902n0:126_0: Pucchā – dhammikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:127_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ kumārakassapaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:127_2: Āyasmā bhante kumārakassapo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vammikapañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:129_0: Pucchā – rathavinītasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:130_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmatā ca sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā ca puṇṇena mantāṇiputtena aññamaññaṃ pucchāvissajjanavasena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:132_0: Pucchā – nivāpasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:133_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:134_1: imasmiṃ āvuso sutte ko nivāpo ko nevāpiko kā nevāpikaparisā kā migajātā kathañcetissā upamāya attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0902n0:135_1: imasmiṃ bhante sutte nivāpoti kho bhante pañcannetaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:135_2: nevāpikoti kho bhante mārassetaṃ pāpimato adhivacanaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:135_5: imasmiṃ bhante sutte etassa attho evaṃ daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0902n0:137_2: sammāsambuddhena pāsarāsisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:138_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:138_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rammakassa brāhmaṇassa assame bhagavantaṃ ārabbha dhammiyā kathāya sannisīdiṃsu,
anya-e0902n0:139_1: atha kho āvuso tesaṃ sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sannisinnānaṃ kīdisaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:140_1: sādhu bhikkhave etaṃ kho bhikkhave tumhākaṃ patirūpaṃ kulaputtānaṃ saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitānaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:140_3: sannipatitānaṃ vo bhikkhave dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ dhammī vā kathā ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo.
anya-e0902n0:140_4: Dvemā bhikkhave pariyesanā ariyā ca pariyesanā anariyā ca pariyesanā.
anya-e0902n0:140_5: Evamādinā bhante bhagavā sannipatitānaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ariyapariyesanañca anariyapariyesanañca vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0902n0:141_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā attanāpi anariyapariyesanaṃ pahāya ariyapariyesanāya pariyesitabhāvaṃ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:142_1: ahampi sudaṃ bhikkhave pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhammaṃyeva pariyesāmi,
anya-e0902n0:142_2: attanā jarādhammo byādhidhammo maraṇadhammo sokadhammo saṃkilesadhammo samāno saṃkilesadhammaṃyeva pariyesāmi.
anya-e0902n0:142_3: Evamādinā bhante bhagavā attanāpi anariyapariyesanaṃ pahāya ariyapariyesanāya pariyesitabhāvaṃ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:143_1: evaṃ paṭhamābhisambuddhassa āvuso bhagavato ajapālanigrodharukkhamūle nisinnassa dhammadesanāya katasanniṭṭhānassa kīdiso
anya-e0902n0:145_1: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:145_2: ko imaṃ dhammaṃ khippameva ājānissatī”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato paṭhamābhisambuddhassa ajapālanigrodhamūle
anya-e0902n0:145_4: atha bhante bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena bārāṇasī,
anya-e0902n0:145_6: dveme bhikkhave antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā,
anya-e0902n0:145_8: yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo hīno gāmmo pothujjaniko anariyo anattasaṃhito,
anya-e0902n0:145_9: evamādinā bhante bhagavato paṭhamā dhammadesanā ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:150_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā pāsarāsiupamāya taṃ desanaṃ pariniṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0902n0:151_3: cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
anya-e0902n0:151_7: Kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
anya-e0902n0:151_9: Ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ime kāmaguṇe gathitā mucchitā ajjhopannā anādīnavadassāvino anissaraṇapaññā paribhuñjanti,
anya-e0902n0:151_10: te evamassu veditabbā “anayamāpannā byāsanamāpannā yathākāmakaraṇīyā pāpimato”,
anya-e0902n0:151_11: evamādinā bhante bhagavā pāsarāsiupamāya dhammadesanaṃ pariniṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0902n0:153_2: sammāsambuddhena cūḷahatthipadopamasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:154_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:154_2: Jāṇussoṇi bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yāvatako ahosi pilotikena paribbājakena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo,
anya-e0902n0:155_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā hatthipadopamaṃ vitthārena paripūretvā desesi.
anya-e0902n0:156_1: “na kho brāhmaṇa ettāvatā hatthipadopamo vitthārena paripūro hoti,
anya-e0902n0:156_2: api ca brāhmaṇa yathā hatthipadopamo vitthārena paripūro hoti,
anya-e0902n0:156_4: evamādinā bhante bhagavā hatthipadopamaṃ paripūretvā brāhmaṇassa jāṇussoṇissa desesi.
anya-e0902n0:158_0: Pucchā – mahāhatthipadopamasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:159_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:161_0: Pucchā – mahāsāropamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:162_2: devadatto bhante saṅghaṃ bhinditvā ruhiruppādakammaṃ katvā acirapakkanto hoti,
anya-e0902n0:164_0: Pucchā – cūḷasāropamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:165_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante piṅgalakocchaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:165_2: piṅgalakoccho bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:167_0: Pucchā – cūḷagosiṅgasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:168_0: Vissajjanā – nābhike bhante gosiṅgasālavanadāye āyasmatā anuruddhattherena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:170_0: Pucchā – mahāgosiṅgasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:171_1: gosiṅgasālavanadāye bhante āyasmatā ca sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā ca mahāmoggallānattherena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:173_0: Pucchā – mahāgopālakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:174_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:176_0: Pucchā – cūḷagopālakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:177_0: Vissajjanā – vajjīsu bhante ukkacelāyaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:179_2: sammāsambuddhena cūḷasaccakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:180_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:180_2: saccako nigaṇṭhaputto mahatiyā licchaviparisāya saddhiṃ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0902n0:180_3: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kathaṃ pana bhavaṃ gotamo sāvake vineti,
anya-e0902n0:180_4: kathaṃ bhāgā ca pana bhoto gotamassa sāvakesu anusāsanī bahulā pavattatī”ti,
anya-e0902n0:180_5: atha bhante bhagavatā aniccavāde ca anattavāde ca pakāsite saccako nigaṇṭhaputto pathavīupamaṃ dassetvā attano attavādaṃ pakāsesi,
anya-e0902n0:181_1: evaṃ āvuso saccakena nigaṇṭhaputtena mahāpathavīupamaṃ dassetvā attavāde pakāsite kathaṃ bhagavā taṃ
anya-e0902n0:181_2: attavādaṃ puna patiṭṭhāpetvā samanuyuñji samanugāhi samanubhāsi.
anya-e0902n0:182_7: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ taṃ attavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0902n0:182_8: Patiṭṭhāpetvā ca pana bhante bhagavā “tena hi aggivessana taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi,
anya-e0902n0:182_10: tathā taṃ byākareyyāsī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ samanuyuñji samanugāhi samanubhāsi.
anya-e0902n0:183_1: evaṃ kho āvuso saccake nigaṇṭhaputte tuṇhībhūte adhomukhe pajjhāyante appaṭibhāne nisinne dummukho nāma licchaviputto bhagavantaṃ kiṃ vacanaṃ avoca.
anya-e0902n0:184_1: evaṃ bhante saccake nigaṇṭhaputte tuṇhībhūte maṅkubhūte pattakkhandhe adhomukhe pajjhāyante appaṭibhāne
anya-e0902n0:184_2: dummukho licchaviputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “upamā maṃ bhagavā paṭibhātī”ti.
anya-e0902n0:185_1: atha kho āvuso saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṃ kīdisaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:186_1: atha kho bhante saccako nigaṇṭhaputto dummukhaṃ licchaviṃ apasādetvā bhagavantaṃ sekhañca asekhañca pañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:186_2: bhagavā ca bhante “idha aggivessana mama sāvako yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā
anya-e0902n0:186_3: bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā” evamādinā sekhañca asekhañca
anya-e0902n0:187_0: Buddho so bhagavā bodhāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:188_0: Danto so bhagavā damathāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:189_0: Santo so bhagavā samathāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:190_0: Tiṇṇo so bhagavā taraṇāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:191_0: Parinibbuto so bhagavā parinibbānāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:193_0: Pucchā – mahāsaccakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:194_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante saccakaṃyeva nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:194_2: Saccako bhante nigaṇṭhaputto aparadivase bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato sāvake āsajja bhāvanādvayapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
anya-e0902n0:195_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ paṭipucchitvā bhāvanādvayaṃ vibhajja kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:196_1: atha kho bhante bhagavā “kinti pana te aggivessana kāyabhāvanā sutā”ti evamādinā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ paṭipucchitvā,
anya-e0902n0:196_2: kathañca aggivessana abhāvitakāyo ca hoti abhāvitacitto ca evamādinā bhāvanādvayaṃ vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:197_1: atha kho āvuso saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṃ kiṃ vacanaṃ avoca,
anya-e0902n0:197_2: kathañca bhagavā padhānakāle attanāanubhūtapubbā paramukkaṃsagatā sukhadukkhavedanāyo pakāsesi,
anya-e0902n0:197_3: yāpi bhagavato cittaṃ na pariyādāya aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:198_1: atha kho bhante saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “na hi nūna bhoto gotamassa uppajjati,
anya-e0902n0:198_3: yathārūpā uppannā sukhāvedanā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyya,
anya-e0902n0:198_4: na hi nūna bhoto gotamassa uppajjati tathārūpā dukkhā vedanā,
anya-e0902n0:198_5: yathārūpā uppannā dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyyā”ti atha kho bhagavā “kiñhi no siyā aggivessana,
anya-e0902n0:198_6: idha me aggivessena pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi,
anya-e0902n0:198_7: evamādinā bhante bhagavā padhānakāle attanānubhūtapubbā paramukkaṃsagatā sukhadukkhavedanāyo vitthārena,
anya-e0902n0:198_8: yāpi bhagavato cittaṃ na pariyādāya aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:200_2: sammāsambuddhena cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:201_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:201_2: Sakko bhante devānamindo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “kittāvatānukho bhante bhikkhu saṃkhittena
anya-e0902n0:201_3: taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho
anya-e0902n0:202_0: Kittāvatā nu kho bhante bhikkhu saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemī
anya-e0902n0:204_0: Pucchā – mahātaṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:205_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sātiṃ bhikkhuṃ kevaṭṭaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:205_2: Sātissa bhante bhikkhuno kevaṭṭaputtassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
anya-e0902n0:205_3: yathā tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati anañña”nti.
anya-e0902n0:206_1: atha kho āvuso bhagavā kathaṃ bhikkhū āmantetvā ca paṭipucchitvā ca anattabhāvadīpikaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:207_1: atha bhante bhagavā bhikkhū “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0902n0:207_2: apināyaṃ sāti bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto usmīkatopi ismiṃ dhammavinaye”ti āmantetvā,
anya-e0902n0:207_3: tumhepi me bhikkhave evaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāthatyādinā bhikkhū paṭipucchitvā ca yaṃ yadeva bhikkhave paccayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:207_4: tena teneva viññāṇaṃ tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0902n0:207_5: cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0902n0:207_6: evamādinā bhante anattatādīpikaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:209_0: Pucchā – mahāassapurasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:210_1: aṅgesu bhante assapure nāma aṅgānaṃ nigame bahū manusse saddhe pasanne ārabbbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:210_2: Bahū bhante manussā saddhā pasannā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu,
anya-e0902n0:211_1: katame āvuso tattha bhagavatā dhammā samaṇakaraṇā ca brāhmaṇakaraṇā ca uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:212_1: hirottappā parisuddhakāyasamācāro parisuddhavacīsamācāro parisuddhamanosamācāro parisuddhājīvo indriyesu
anya-e0902n0:212_2: guttadvāratā bhojanemattaññutā jāgariyānuyogo satisampajaññaṃ nīvaraṇappahānaṃ cattāri ca jhānāni tisso

anya-e0902n0:216_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadā ca assamaṇasāmīcippaṭipadā ca vibhajitvā desitā.

anya-e0902n0:217_2: yassa kassaci bhikkhave bhikkhuno abhijjhālussa abhijjhā appahīnā hoti,
anya-e0902n0:217_3: byāpannacittassa byāpādo appahīno hotī”ti evamādinā ca.

anya-e0902n0:217_5: yassa kassaci bhikkhave bhikkhuno abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīnā hoti,

anya-e0902n0:219_0: Pucchā – sāleyyakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0902n0:220_2: Sāleyyakā bhante brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ “ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0902n0:220_3: yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti,
anya-e0902n0:220_4: ko pana bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0902n0:220_5: yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
anya-e0902n0:222_0: Pucchā – verañjakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0902n0:223_3: yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti,
anya-e0902n0:223_4: ko pana bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,

anya-e0902n0:225_0: Pucchā – mahāvedallasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:226_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmatā mahākoṭṭhikena puṭṭhena āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:228_0: Pucchā – cūḷavedallasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:229_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante visākhena upāsakena puṭṭhāya dhammadinnāya theriyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:231_0: Pucchā – cūḷadhammasamādānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:232_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:234_0: Pucchā – mahādhammasamādānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:235_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:237_0: Pucchā – vīmaṃsakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:238_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:240_0: Pucchā – kosambiyasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0902n0:241_2: Kosambikā bhante bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti.
anya-e0902n0:243_0: Pucchā – brahmanimantanikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:244_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:246_0: Pucchā – māratajjanīyasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:247_1: sakkesu bhante susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:247_2: Māro bhante pāpimā āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa kucchigato hoti koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭho.
anya-e0902n0:250_2: sammāsambuddhena kandarakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:251_1: campāyaṃ bhante gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre pessañca hatthārohaputtaṃ kandarakañca paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:251_2: kandarako bhante paribbājako bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
anya-e0902n0:251_3: pesso ca bhante hatthārohaputto bhagavato ca dhammadesanāya ca vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e0902n0:252_1: evaṃ kho āvuso kandarakena paribbājakena bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca abhippasannena vaṇṇe bhāsite
anya-e0902n0:252_2: kathaṃ bhagavā taṃ samanujānitvā dhammadesanārambhaṃ ārabhi,
anya-e0902n0:252_3: kathañca pesso hatthārohaputto bhagavato ca dhammadesanāya ca vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
anya-e0902n0:252_4: kathañca pessassa hatthārohaputtassa ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e0902n0:253_1: evaṃ kho bhante kandarakena paribbājakena bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca abhippasannena vaṇṇe bhāsite
anya-e0902n0:253_2: “evametaṃ kandaraka evametaṃ kandaraka” evamādinā bhagavā taṃ samanujānitvā “santi hi kandaraka bhikkhū
anya-e0902n0:253_3: imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe arahanto khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanā
anya-e0902n0:253_5: Atha kho bhante pesso hatthārohaputto “acchariyaṃ bhante abbhutaṃ bhante yāva supaññattā cime bhante
anya-e0902n0:253_6: bhagavatā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya
anya-e0902n0:253_7: ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavato ca dhammadesanāya vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
anya-e0902n0:253_9: uttānakañhetaṃ pessa yadidaṃ pasavo”tiādinā pessassa hatthārohaputtassa ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammakathaṃ desesi.
anya-e0902n0:254_1: taṃ panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pessassa hatthārohaputtassa kīdiso ānisaṃso adhigato,
anya-e0902n0:254_2: kathañca bhagavā taṃ puggalacatukkadesanaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:255_1: taṃ kho pana bhante dhammaṃ sutvā pessassa hatthārohaputtassa dve ānisaṃsā adhigatā saṅghe ca pasādo satipaṭṭhānapariggahaṇūpāyo ca abhinavo.
anya-e0902n0:255_2: Bhagavā ca bhante taṃ puggalacatukkadesanaṃ bhikkhūhi yācito “katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto”tiādinā saṃkhittena bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:257_0: Pucchā – aṭṭhakanāgarasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:258_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante veḷuvagāmake gahapatiṃ aṭṭhakanāgaraṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:258_2: Dasamo bhante gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “atthi nu kho bhante
anya-e0902n0:258_3: ānanda tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo akkhāto,
anya-e0902n0:258_4: yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttañceva cittaṃ vimuccati,
anya-e0902n0:260_0: Pucchā – sekhasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:261_1: sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ santhāgāre āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena kāpilavatthave sakye ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:261_2: Bhagavā bhante kāpilavatthave sakye bahudevarattiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā
anya-e0902n0:261_3: sampahaṃsetvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi “paṭibhātu taṃ ānanda kāpilavatthavānaṃ sakyānaṃ sekho pāṭipado,
anya-e0902n0:263_0: Pucchā – potaliyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:264_1: aṅguttarāpesu bhante āpaṇe nāma aṅguttarāpānaṃ nigame potaliyaṃ gahapatiṃ paṭikkhittasabbakammantaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:264_2: Potaliyo bhante gahapati paṭikkhittasabbakammanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0902n0:264_3: upasaṅkamanto bhagavatā gahapativādena samudācariyamāno kupito anattamano bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “tayidaṃ bho gotama nacchannaṃ tayidaṃ nappatirūpaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:265_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ vitthārena pakāsetvā ariyassa vinaye vohārasamucchedaṃ dassesi.
anya-e0902n0:266_1: atha bhante bhagavā ariyassa vinaye vohārasamucchedāya aṭṭha dhamme vibhajitvā “seyyathāpi gahapati kukkuro
anya-e0902n0:266_2: jighacchādubbalyapareto goghātakasūnaṃ paccupaṭṭhito assa” evamādinā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ dassetvā pariyosāne
anya-e0902n0:266_3: tīhi vijjāhi ariyassa vinaye vohārasamucchedaṃ sabbenasabbaṃ sabbathāsabbaṃ vohārasamucchedaṃ vitthārena
anya-e0902n0:268_2: sammāsambuddhena jīvakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:269_1: rājagahe bhante jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:269_2: Jīvako bhante komārabhacco bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bhante samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ ārabhanti,
anya-e0902n0:269_3: taṃ samaṇo gotamo jānaṃ uddissa kataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjati paṭicca kammanti.
anya-e0902n0:269_4: Ye te bhante evamāhaṃsu ‘samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ ārabhanti,
anya-e0902n0:269_5: taṃ samaṇo gotamo jānaṃ uddissa kataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjati paṭicca kamma’nti,
anya-e0902n0:269_6: kacci te bhante bhagavato vuttavādino na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhanti,
anya-e0902n0:269_8: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchatī”ti.
anya-e0902n0:271_0: Pucchā – upālisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:272_1: nāḷandāyaṃ bhante upāliṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:272_2: Upāli bhante gahapati bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “āgamā nukhvidha bhante dīghatapassī nigaṇṭho”ti,
anya-e0902n0:272_3: evamādinā ca bhante upāli gahapati bhagavato paṭisandhāraṃ katvā attano ācariyassa nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa vādaṃ pakāsesi,
anya-e0902n0:273_1: atha kho āvuso bhagavā upāliṃ gahapatiṃ tasmiṃ vāde kathaṃ samanuyuñjī samanugāhī samanubhāsī,
anya-e0902n0:273_2: kathañcassa upāyaṃ dassetvā yathābhūtaṃ atthaṃ ñāpesi.
anya-e0902n0:274_1: atha kho bhante bhagavā upāliṃ gahapatiṃ “sace kho tvaṃ gahapati sacce patiṭṭhāya manteyyāsi,
anya-e0902n0:274_2: siyā no ettha kathāsallāpo”ti upāliṃ gahapatiṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā “taṃ kiṃmaññasi gahapati,
anya-e0902n0:274_3: idhassa nigaṇṭho ābādhiko dukkhito bāñhagilāno sītodakaparikkhitto uṇhodakapaṭisevī,
anya-e0902n0:274_4: so sītodakaṃ alabhamāno kālaṅkareyyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavā cattāro upāye dassetvā upāliṃ gahapatiṃ yathābhūtamatthaṃ ñāpesi.
anya-e0902n0:275_1: evaṃ kho āvuso upāli gahapati bhagavatā saññāpito imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāraṃ akāsi,
anya-e0902n0:275_2: kathañca bhagavā taṃ puna anusāsitvā uttari vinesi.
anya-e0902n0:276_2: apicāhaṃ imāni bhagavato vicitrāni pañhapaṭibhānāni sotukāmo,
anya-e0902n0:276_4: evamādinā bhante upāli gahapati bhagavatā viññāpito imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāraṃ akāsi.
anya-e0902n0:276_5: Tattha bhagavā ca bhante “anuviccakāraṃ kho gahapati karohi,
anya-e0902n0:276_6: anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṃ ñātamanussānaṃ sādhu hotī”ti evamādinā puna anusāsitvā uttari yāva dhammacakkhupaṭilābhā vinesi.
anya-e0902n0:277_1: kathañcāvuso nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa upālissa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ gantvā āvīmaṃsanā ca upālissa gahapatissa paccuttarā kathā ca ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:278_1: “ummattosi tvaṃ gahapati dattosi tvaṃ gahapatī”ti evamādinā bhante nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa upālissa
anya-e0902n0:278_2: gahapatissa nivesanaṃ gantvā vīmaṃsā ca “bhaddikā bhante āvaṭṭanīmāyā kalyāṇī bhante āvaṭṭanīmāyāti”
anya-e0902n0:278_3: evamādinā upālissa gahapatissa paccuttarakathā ca ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:298_0: Pucchā – kukkuravatikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:299_1: koliyesu bhante haliddavasane nāma koliyānaṃ nigame puṇṇañca koliyaputtaṃ govatikaṃ acelañca seniyaṃ kukkuravatikaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:299_2: Puṇṇo bhante koliya putto govatiko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ayaṃ bhante acelo seniyo kukkuravatiko dukkarakārako chamānikkhittaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati,
anya-e0902n0:299_3: tassa taṃ kukkuravataṃ dīgharattaṃ samattaṃ samādinnaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:301_2: sammāsambuddhena abhayarājakumārasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:302_1: rājagahe me bhante abhayaṃ rājakumāraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:302_2: Abhayo bhante rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “bhāseyya nu kho bhante tathāgato taṃ vācaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:302_3: yā sā vācā paresaṃ appiyā amanāpā”ti,
anya-e0902n0:304_0: Pucchā – bahuvedanīyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:305_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantañca udāyiṃ pañcakaṅgañca thapatiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:305_2: pañcakaṅgo bhante thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ upasaṅkamitvā vedanaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:305_3: āyasmā bhante udāyī pañcakaṅgaṃ thapatiṃ etadavoca “tisso kho thapati vedanā vuttā bhagavatā sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhā vedanā”ti.
anya-e0902n0:305_4: Evaṃ vutte bhante pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca “na kho bhante udāyi tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā,
anya-e0902n0:305_5: dve vedanā vuttā bhagavatā sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā,
anya-e0902n0:305_7: santasmiṃ esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
anya-e0902n0:305_8: Neva asakkhi kho bhante āyasmā udāyī pañcakaṅgaṃ thapatiṃ saññāpetuṃ,
anya-e0902n0:305_9: na pana asakkhi pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ saññāpetuṃ.
anya-e0902n0:305_10: Assosi kho āyasmā ānando āyasmato udāyissa pañcakaṅgena thapatinā saddhiṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:305_11: atha kho bhante āyasmā ānando yāvatako ahosi āyasmato udāyissa pañcakaṅgena thapatinā saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo,
anya-e0902n0:307_0: Pucchā – apaṇṇakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:308_1: kosalesu bhante sālāyaṃ nāma kosalānaṃ brāhmaṇagāme sāleyyake brāhmaṇagahapatike ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:308_2: Sambahulā bhante aññatitthiyā sāleyyakānaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ attano attano micchādiṭṭhiyo paṭiggaṇhāpesuṃ uggaṇhāpesuṃ.
anya-e0902n0:308_3: Te pana bhante sāleyyakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā ekadiṭṭhiyampi patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkhiṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:309_0: Pucchā – tatra āvuso bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ micchāvādo ca sammāvādo ca kathaṃ vibhajitvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:310_1: tatra bhante bhagavatā “santi gahapatayo eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino natthi dinnaṃ natthi
anya-e0902n0:310_2: yiṭṭhaṃ natthi hutaṃ natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko”ti evamādinā paṭhamaṃ micchāvādo
anya-e0902n0:311_0: Pucchā – tattha āvuso bhagavatā micchāvādīnañca doso sammāvādīnañca guṇo kathaṃ vicāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:312_1: tattha bhante bhagavatā “tatra gahapatayo yete samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino natthi dinnaṃ natthi
anya-e0902n0:312_2: yiṭṭhaṃ natthi hutaṃ natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko”ti evamādinā bhante micchāvādīnañca
anya-e0902n0:312_3: doso sammāvādīnañca guṇo bhagavatā vicāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:313_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā viññuno purisapuggalassa paṭisañcikkhaṇā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:314_1: tatra gahapatayo viññū puriso iti paṭisañcikkhatīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā viññuno purisapuggalassa paṭisañcikkhaṇā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:315_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavatā aññesupi micchāvādasammāvādesu apaṇṇakapaṭipadā vicāretvā pakāsitā,
anya-e0902n0:316_2: evameva kho bhante akiriyavādādīsu catūsu ca micchāvādesu dosaṃ kiriyavādādīsu ca catūsu sammāvādesu guṇaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:316_3: tattha ca viññuno purisassa paṭisañcikkhaṇākāraṃ dassetvā bhagavatā apaṇṇakapaṭipadā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:318_0: Pucchā – ambalaṭṭhikarāhulovādasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:319_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:321_0: Pucchā – mahārāhulovādasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:322_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:322_2: Āyasmā bhante rāhulo bhagavato ceva attano ca attabhāvasampattiṃ nissāya gehassitaṃ chandarāgaṃ uppādesi.
anya-e0902n0:324_0: Pucchā – cūḷamālukyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:325_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ mālukyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:325_2: Āyasmā bhante mālukyaputto attano pavivittassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa cetaso parivitakkaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
anya-e0902n0:327_0: Pucchā – mahāmālukyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:328_0: Vissajjanā – tasmiṃyeva bhante sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ mahāmālukyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:330_2: sammāsambuddhena bhaddālisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:331_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ bhaddāliṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:331_2: Āyasmā bhante bhaddāli bhagavatā sikkhāpade paññāpiyamāne bhikkhusaṅghe sikkhaṃ samādiyamāne anussāhaṃ pavedesi.
anya-e0902n0:332_0: Accayo maṃ bhante accagamā yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:332_1: yohaṃ bhagavatā sikkhāpade paññāpiyamāne bhikkhusaṅghe sikkhaṃ samādiyamāne anussāhaṃ pavedesiṃ,
anya-e0902n0:332_2: tassa me bhante bhagavā accayaṃ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṃ saṃvarāya –
anya-e0902n0:333_1: atha kho āvuso āyasmā bhaddāli bhagavantaṃ kīdisaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:334_1: atha kho bhante āyasmā bhaddāli “ko nu kho bhante hetu,
anya-e0902n0:334_3: yena midhekaccaṃ bhikkhuṃ pasayu pasayu kāraṇaṃ karontī”ti evamādinā bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi.
anya-e0902n0:334_4: Bhagavā ca bhante “idha bhaddāli ekacco bhikkhu abhiṇhāpattiko hoti,
anya-e0902n0:334_5: āpattibahulo” evamādinā āyasmato bhaddālissa vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:335_1: tadāpi kho āvuso āyasmā bhaddāli punapi bhagavantaṃ kīdisaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:336_1: tadāpi bhante āyasmā bhaddāli “ko nu kho bhante hetu,
anya-e0902n0:336_3: yena pubbe appatarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni ahesuṃ,
anya-e0902n0:336_6: ko paccayo yena etarahi bahutarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni honti appatarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇḍahantī”ti bhagavantaṃ punapi pañhaṃ apucchi.
anya-e0902n0:336_8: sattesu hāyamānesu saddhamme antaradhāyamāne bahutarāni honti appatarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇḍahantī”ti,
anya-e0902n0:336_9: evamādinā āyasmato bhaddālissa vibhajitvā vibhajitvā byākatā.
anya-e0902n0:338_0: Pucchā – laṭukikopamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:339_1: aṅguttarāpesu bhante āpaṇe nāma aṅguttarāpānaṃ nigame āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:339_2: Āyasmā bhante udāyī bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “idha mayhaṃ bhante rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa
anya-e0902n0:339_3: evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā dukkhadhammānaṃ apahattā,
anya-e0902n0:339_4: bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā sukhadhammānaṃ upahattā,
anya-e0902n0:339_5: bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ apahattā,
anya-e0902n0:339_6: bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upahattā’ti”.
anya-e0902n0:340_0: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso bhagavā kīdisī upamāyo dassetvā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n0:341_1: atha kho bhante bhagavā laṭukikopamaṃ hatthināgopamaṃ daliddapurisopamaṃ gahapatikopamanti catasso upamāyo dassetvā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0902n0:342_1: evañcāvuso bhagavā catūhi upamāhi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ datvā kathaṃ uttari dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍhesi.
anya-e0902n0:343_1: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā catūhi upamāhi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ datvā “cattāro me udāyi puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā
anya-e0902n0:343_2: lokasmiṃ”nti evamādinā uttari bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathaṃ pavaḍḍhesi.
anya-e0902n0:345_0: Pucchā – cātumasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:346_1: cātumāyaṃ bhante āyasmantānaṃ sāriputtamoggalānattherānaṃ saddhivihārike adhunā pabbajite sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:346_2: Sāriputtamoggallānappamukhāni bhante pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni cātumaṃ anuppattāni honti bhagavantaṃ dassanāya,
anya-e0902n0:346_3: te ca āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0902n0:347_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n0:348_1: cattārimāni bhikkhave bhayāni udakorohante pātikaṅkhitabbānīti evamādinā bhante bhagavā tattha bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n0:350_0: Pucchā – naḷakapānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:351_1: naḷakapāne bhante anuruddhattherappamukhe sambahule abhiññāte abhiññāte kulaputte ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:353_0: Pucchā – goliyānisuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:354_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ goliyāniṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:354_2: Āyasmā bhante goliyāni āraññiko padasamācāro saṅghamajjhe osaṭo hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena,
anya-e0902n0:356_2: sammāsambuddhena kīṭāgirisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:357_1: kāsīsu bhante kīṭāgirismiṃ kāsīnaṃ nigame assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:357_2: Assajipunabbasukā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānā evamāhaṃsu “mayaṃ kho āvuso sāyañceva bhuñjāma pāto ca divā ca vikāle,
anya-e0902n0:357_3: te mayaṃ sāyañceva bhuñjamānā pāto ca divā ca vikāle appābādhatañca sañjānāma appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca balañca phāsuvihārañca,
anya-e0902n0:357_4: te mayaṃ kiṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ hitvā kālikaṃ anudhāvissāma,
anya-e0902n0:357_5: sāyañceva mayaṃ bhuñjissāma pāto ca divā ca vikāle”ti.
anya-e0902n0:359_0: Pucchā – tevijjavacchasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:360_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante vacchagottaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:360_2: Vacchagotto bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sutaṃ me bhante samaṇo gotamo sabbaññū sabbadassāvī aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānāti,
anya-e0902n0:360_3: carato ca me tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhita”nti.
anya-e0902n0:360_4: Ye te bhante evamāhaṃsu “samaṇo gotamo sabbaññū sabbadassāvī aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānāti,
anya-e0902n0:360_5: carato ca me tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhita”nti.
anya-e0902n0:360_9: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchatī”ti.
anya-e0902n0:362_0: Pucchā – aggivacchasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:363_2: Vacchagotto bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ nu kho bho gotama ‘sassato loko idameva
anya-e0902n0:363_3: saccaṃ moghamañña’nti evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavaṃ gotamo”ti evamādikaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi.
anya-e0902n0:365_0: Pucchā – mahāvacchasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:366_1: rājagahe bhante vacchagottaṃyeva paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:366_2: Vacchagotto bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “dīgharattāhaṃ bhotā gotamena sahakathī,
anya-e0902n0:366_3: sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo saṃkhittena kusalākusalaṃ desetū”ti.
anya-e0902n0:367_1: evaṃ vutte kho āvuso vacchagotto paribbājako imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno hutvā kīdisaṃ pasannākāraṃ akāsi,
anya-e0902n0:368_1: evaṃ vutte bhante vacchagotto paribbājako “sace hi bho gotama imaṃ dhammaṃ bhavaṃyeva gotamo ārādhako abhavissa,
anya-e0902n0:368_2: no ca kho bhikkhū ārādhakā abhavissaṃsu,
anya-e0902n0:368_3: evamidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ aparipūraṃ abhavissa tenaṅgenā”ti evamādinā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n0:370_0: Pucchā – dīghanakhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:371_1: rājagahe bhante dīghanakhaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:371_2: Dīghanakho bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “ahañhi bho gotama evaṃvādī evaṃdiṭṭhi sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti.
anya-e0902n0:372_0: Pucchā – imasmiṃ ca panāvuso veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne kesaṃ puggalānaṃ visesādhigamo ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:373_1: imasmiñca pana bhante veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne āyasmato sāriputtassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci,
anya-e0902n0:373_2: dīghanakhassa pana paribbājakassa tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:375_0: Pucchā – māgaṇḍiyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:376_1: kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṃ nigame bhāradvāja gottassa brāhmaṇassa agyāgāre tiṇasanthārake māgaṇḍiyaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:376_2: Māgaṇḍiyo bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ “bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo”ti vadesi,
anya-e0902n0:377_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā tattha māgaṇḍiyassa paribbājakassa samanuyuñjitvā samanuyuñjitvā dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e0902n0:378_2: taṃ tathāgatassa dantaṃ guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:378_3: tassa ca saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desetī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavā māgaṇḍiyassa paribbājakassa samanuyuñjitvā samanuyuñjitvā dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e0902n0:379_1: evaṃ kho āvuso māgaṇḍiyena paribbājakena “nakiñci bho gotamā”ti yathābhūtaṃ paṭissute kathaṃ bhagavā attanopi na kiñci kenacipi vattabbataṃ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:380_1: evaṃ kho bhante māgaṇḍiyena paribbājakena nakiñci bhogotamāti yathābhūtaṃ paṭissute “ahaṃ kho pana māgaṇḍiya
anya-e0902n0:380_2: pubbe agāriyabhūto samāno pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāresiṃ cakkhuviññeyyahi rūpehi
anya-e0902n0:380_3: iṭṭhehi manāpehi piyarūpehi kāmūpasaṃhitehi rajanīyehī”ti evamādinā bhagavā attanopi na kiñci kenacipi
anya-e0902n0:381_1: imasmiṃ sutte pariyosānapucchaṃ pucchissāmi imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā māgaṇḍiyo paribbājako
anya-e0902n0:381_2: imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno hutvā kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n0:382_1: imaṃ ca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā māgaṇḍiyo paribbājako ‘abhikkantaṃ bho gotama abhikkantaṃ bho
anya-e0902n0:382_2: gotamā”ti evamādinā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n0:384_0: Pucchā – sandakasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:385_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante sandakaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:385_2: Sandako bhante paribbājako āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “sādhuvata bhavantaṃyeva ānandaṃ paṭibhātu sake ācariya ke dhammikathā”ti,
anya-e0902n0:386_1: kathañcāvuso tattha cattāro abrahmacariyavāsā āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena vicāretvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:387_1: idha sandaka ekacco satthā evaṃvādī hoti evaṃdiṭṭhi natthi dinnaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:388_0: Evamādinā bhante tattha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena cattāro abrahmacariyavāsā vicāretvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:389_1: kathañcāvuso tattha cattāri anassāsikāni brahmacariyāni āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena vicāretvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:390_1: idha sandaka ekacco satthā sabbaññū sabbadassāvī aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānāti “carato ca me tiṭṭhato
anya-e0902n0:390_2: ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhita”nti evamādinā bhante tattha āyasmatā
anya-e0902n0:390_3: ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena cattāri anassāsikāni brahmacariyāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:392_0: Kho āvuso sandako paribbājako āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ kathaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:393_1: atha kho bhante sandako paribbājako “so pana bho ānanda satthā kiṃvādī kiṃ akkhāyī”ti evamādinā āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:393_2: āyasmā ca bhante ānandatthero “idha sandaka tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno”ti
anya-e0902n0:393_3: evamādinā sandakassa paribbājakassa vibhajitvā vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:394_1: imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sandako paribbājako imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n0:395_1: imañca bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sandako paribbājako “acchariyaṃ bho ānanda,
anya-e0902n0:395_6: tāva bahukā ca niyyātāro paññāyissantī”ti evamādinā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n0:397_0: Pucchā – mahāsakuludāyisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:398_1: rājagahe bhante sakuludāyiṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
