anya-e0902n0:495_2: esukārī bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “brāhmaṇā bho gotama catasso pāricariyā paññapenti,
anya-e0902n0:497_0: Pucchā – dhanañjānisuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:498_1: rājagahe bhante dhanañjāniṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:499_1: atha kho āvuso āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati kathaṃ dhanañjāniṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:499_2: kathañca so āyasmato sāriputtattherassa dhammasenāpatissa ārocesi.
anya-e0902n0:500_2: evaṃ kho bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati dhanañjāniṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:500_3: dhanañjāni ca bhante brāhmaṇo “kuto bho sāriputta amhākaṃ appamādo,
anya-e0902n0:501_1: evaṃ vutte kho āvuso āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa kīdisaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:502_1: evaṃ vutte bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati “taṃ kiṃ maññasi dhanañjāni,
anya-e0902n0:502_2: idhekacco mātāpitūnaṃ hetu adhammacārī visamacārī assa,
anya-e0902n0:502_3: tamenaṃ adhammacariyā visamacariyāhetu nirayaṃ nirayapālā upakaḍḍheyyu”nti,
anya-e0902n0:503_1: puna pi āvuso āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati kathaṃ dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa aparenapi pariyāyena anusāsaniṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n0:504_1: punapi bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati “taṃ kiṃ maññasi dhanañjāni,
anya-e0902n0:504_2: yo vā mātāpitūnaṃ hetu adhammacārī visamacārī assa,
anya-e0902n0:504_3: yo vā mātāpitūnaṃ hetu dhammacārī samacārī assa,
anya-e0902n0:504_5: evamādinā dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa aparenapi pariyāyena ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0902n0:505_1: aparabhāge pi āvuso āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati kathaṃ dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa maraṇasamaye dhammakathaṃ kathesi,
anya-e0902n0:506_1: aparabhāge pi bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa maraṇasamayepi cattāro brahmavihāre desesi,
anya-e0902n0:506_2: dhanañjāni ca bhante brāhmaṇo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā brahmalokūpago ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:508_0: Pucchā – vāseṭṭhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:509_1: icchānaṅgale bhante vāseṭṭhaṃ māṇavaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:509_2: Vāseṭṭho bhante māṇavo bhagavantaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi –
anya-e0902n0:514_0: Tesaṃ no jātivādasmiṃ, vivādo atthi gotama.
anya-e0902n0:515_0: Jātiyā brāhmaṇo hoti, bhāradvājo iti bhāsati;
anya-e0902n0:516_0: Ahañca kammunā brūmi, evaṃ jānāhi cakkhuma.
anya-e0902n0:517_0: Tena sakkoma ñāpetuṃ, aññaṃmaññaṃ mayaṃ ubho;
anya-e0902n0:519_0: Candaṃ yathā khayātītaṃ, pecca pañjalikā janā;
anya-e0902n0:521_0: Cakkhuṃ loke samuppannaṃ, mayaṃ pucchāma gotamaṃ;
anya-e0902n0:522_0: Jātiyā brāhmaṇo hoti, udāhu bhavati kammunā;
anya-e0902n0:523_0: Ajānataṃ no pabrūhi, yathā jānemu brāhmaṇanti.
anya-e0902n0:526_0: Pucchā – subhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:527_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante subhaṃ māṇavaṃ todeyyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:527_2: Subho bhante māṇavo todeyyaputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “brāhmaṇā bho gotama evamāhaṃsu’ gahaṭṭho ārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:527_3: na pabbajito ārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalanti,
anya-e0902n0:528_1: puna pi āvuso subho māṇavo todeyyaputto kathaṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:529_1: “brāhmaṇā bho gotama evamāhaṃsu ‘mahaṭṭhamidaṃ mahākiccaṃ mahādhikaraṇaṃ mahāsamārambhaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:529_6: Evaṃ kho bhante subho māṇavo todeyyaputto punapi bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
anya-e0902n0:529_7: Bhagavā ca bhante “etthāpi kho ahaṃ māṇava vibhajjavādā,
anya-e0902n0:531_0: Pucchā – saṅgāravasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:532_1: kosalesu bhante cañcalikappe nāma gāme saṅgāravaṃ māṇavaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:532_2: saṅgāravo bhante māṇavo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “santi kho bho gotama eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā diṭṭhadhammābhiññāvosānapāramippattā
anya-e0902n0:532_4: Tatra bho gotama ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā diṭṭhadhammābhiññāvosānapāramippattā ādibrahmacariyaṃ paṭijānanti,
anya-e0902n0:534_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena devadahasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:535_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante devadahe nāma sakyānaṃ nigame samma hule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:537_0: Pucchā – pañcattayasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:538_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:540_0: Pucchā – kintisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:541_0: Vissajjanā – pisinārāyaṃ bhante baliharaṇe nāma vanasaṇḍe sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:542_1: tattha āvuso bhagavā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ bhikkhū paṭipucchitvā ovādamadāsi,
anya-e0902n0:542_2: yo bahujanassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0902n0:543_1: tattha bhante bhagavā “kinti vo bhikkhave mayi hoti,
anya-e0902n0:543_2: cīvarahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ deseti,
anya-e0902n0:543_5: itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ desetī”ti bhikkhū pucchitvā “tasmātiha bhikkhave ye vo mayā dhammā abhiññā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:543_7: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
anya-e0902n0:543_8: Tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamānehi avivadamānehi sikkhitabbaṃ” evamādinā bhante bhikkhūnaṃ ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0902n0:544_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā tattha dutiyampi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n0:544_2: Yo bahujanassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0902n0:545_1: tattha bhante bhagavā “tesañca vo bhikkhave samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ avivadamānānaṃ sikkhataṃ siyā aññatarassa bhikkhuno āpatti,
anya-e0902n0:545_3: Tatra bhikkhave na codanāya taritabbaṃ puggalo upaparikkhitabbo”ti evamādinā bhikkhūnaṃ dutiyampi ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0902n0:546_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā tattha tatiyampi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi,
anya-e0902n0:546_2: yo bahujanassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0902n0:547_1: “tesañca vo bhikkhave samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ avivadamānānaṃ sikkhataṃ aññamaññassa vacīsaṃhāro uppajjeyya
anya-e0902n0:547_2: diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavā tattha tatiyampi bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0902n0:548_1: tenāvuso bhikkhunā evaṃ satthu ovādānusāsanikārinā āyasmā nu te bhikkhu akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetīti
anya-e0902n0:548_2: parehi puṭṭhena kathaṃ sammā byākaramānena byākātabbaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:549_3: tāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāsiṃ,
anya-e0902n0:549_4: taṃ te bhikkhū dhammaṃ sutvā akusalā vuṭṭhahiṃsu kusale patiṭṭhahiṃsū”ti.
anya-e0902n0:549_5: Evaṃ kho bhante tena bhikkhunā evaṃ satthu ovādānusāsanikārinā parehi puṭṭhena sammā byākaramānena byākātabbaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:551_0: Pucchā – sāmagāmasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:552_1: sakkesu bhante sāmagāme nāma sakyānaṃ nigame āyasmantañca ānandaṃ āyasmantañca cundaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:552_2: āyasmā ca bhante ānando āyasmā ca cundo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamisu,
anya-e0902n0:552_4: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ayaṃ bhante cundo samaṇuddeso evamāha ‘nigaṇṭho bhante nāṭaputto pāvāyaṃ adhunā kālaṅkato,
anya-e0902n0:552_5: tassa kālaṅkiriyāya bhinnā nigaṇṭhā dvedhikajātā bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti…pe…
anya-e0902n0:552_7: Tassa mayhaṃ bhante evaṃ hoti ‘māheva bhagavato accayena saṅghe vivādo uppajji,
anya-e0902n0:552_8: svāssa vivādo bahujanaahitāya bahujanaasukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussāna’nti”.
anya-e0902n0:554_0: Pucchā – sunakkhattasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:555_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante sunakkhattaṃ licchaviputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:555_2: sunakkhatto bhante licchaviputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bhante sambahulehi
anya-e0902n0:555_3: kira bhikkhūhi bhagavato santike aññā byākatā khīṇā jāti,
anya-e0902n0:555_7: Kacci te bhante bhikkhū sammadeva aññaṃ byākaṃsu,
anya-e0902n0:555_8: udāhu santetthekacce bhikkhū adhimānena aññaṃ byākaṃsū”ti,
anya-e0902n0:557_0: Pucchā – āneñjasappāyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:558_0: Vissajjanā – kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṃ nigame sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:560_0: Pucchā – gaṇakamoggallānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:561_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante gaṇakamoggallānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:561_2: gaṇakamoggallāno bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “seyyāthāpi bho gotama imassa migāramātupāsādassa
anya-e0902n0:561_3: dissati anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā yadidaṃ yāva pacchimasopānakaḷevarā…pe…
anya-e0902n0:561_4: sakkā nukho bho gotama imasmimpi dhammavinaye evameva anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā paññapetu”nti,
anya-e0902n0:562_1: evaṃ vutte kho āvuso gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ kiṃ avoca,
anya-e0902n0:563_1: evaṃ vutte bhante gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kiṃ nu kho bhoto gotamassa sāvakā
anya-e0902n0:563_2: bhotā gotamena evaṃ ovadīyamānā evaṃ anusāsīyamānā sabbe accantaṃ niṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārodhenti,
anya-e0902n0:563_4: bhagavā ca bhante “appekacce kho brāhmaṇa mama sāvakā mayā evaṃ ovadīyamānā evaṃ anusāsīyamānā accantaṃ niṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārādhenti,
anya-e0902n0:563_5: ekacce nārādhentī”ti evamādinā gaṇakamoggallānassa brāhmaṇassa byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:564_1: imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā gaṇako moggallāno imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n0:565_1: imañca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo “ye me bho gotama puggalā asaddhā jīvikatthā
anya-e0902n0:565_2: na saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā”ti evamādinā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n0:567_0: Pucchā – gopakamoggallānasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:568_1: rājagahe bhante gopakamoggallānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:568_2: gopakamoggallāno bhante brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “atthi nu kho bho ānanda ekabhikkhupi tehi
anya-e0902n0:568_3: dhammehi sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ samannāgato,
anya-e0902n0:568_4: yehi dhammehi samannāgato so bhavaṃ gotamo ahosi arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti,
anya-e0902n0:569_1: kathañcāvuso tattha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhikkhuno pasādanīyā dhammā pakāsitā,
anya-e0902n0:569_2: ye tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena akkhātā.
anya-e0902n0:569_3: Yehi ca samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ aññe bhikkhū sakkareyyuṃ garuṃ kareyyuṃ māneyyuṃ pūjeyyuṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyyuṃ.
anya-e0902n0:570_2: pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
anya-e0902n0:570_5: yeme dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti,
anya-e0902n0:570_6: tathārūpassa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:570_7: bhante tattha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena dasa pasādanīyā dhammā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:570_8: Ye tena bhagatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena akkhātā,
anya-e0902n0:570_9: yehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ etarahi bhikkhū sakkareyyuṃ garuṃ kareyyuṃ māneyyuṃ pūjeyyuṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyyuṃ.
anya-e0902n0:571_1: evaṃ vutte kho āvuso vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto kīdisaṃ pasaṃsāvacanaṃ kathesi,
anya-e0902n0:571_2: kathañcassa āyasmā ānandatthero dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko taṃ vacanaṃ paṭisodhetvā pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:572_1: evaṃ vutte vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto upanandaṃ senāpatiṃ āmantesi “taṃ kiṃ maññasi bhavaṃ senāpati,
anya-e0902n0:572_6: āyasmā ca bhante ānando “na ca kho brāhmaṇa so bhagavā sabbaṃ jhānaṃ vaṇṇesi,
anya-e0902n0:572_7: napi so bhagavā sabbaṃ jhānaṃ na vaṇṇesī”ti evamādinā taṃ vacanaṃ paṭisodhetvā pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:574_0: Pucchā – mahāpuṇṇamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:575_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ saṭṭhimattānaṃ padhānīyabhikkhūnaṃ saṅghattheraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:576_0: Saṭṭhimattānaṃ padhānīyabhikkhūnaṃ saṅghatthero bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā yena bhagavā
anya-e0902n0:576_1: tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “puccheyyāhaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ kiñcideva desaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:576_2: sace me bhagavā okāsaṃ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti,
anya-e0902n0:578_0: Pucchā – cūḷapuṇṇamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:579_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:580_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā asappurisaaṅgāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:581_8: asappurisadānaṃ detīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā aṭṭha asappurisaaṅgāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:582_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā tattha sappurisaaṅgāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:583_8: sappurisadānaṃ detīti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha aṭṭhavidhāni sappurisaṅgāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:585_0: Pucchā – anupadasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:586_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:586_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa dhammasenāpatissa sabhāgā tasmiṃ samaye sannipatiṃsu,
anya-e0902n0:587_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā āyasmato sāriputtassa dhammasenāpatissa anupadadhammavipassanā vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:588_1: paṇḍito bhikkhave sāriputto mahāpañño bhikkhave sāriputto puthupañño bhikkhave sāriputto hāsapañño bhikkhave
anya-e0902n0:588_2: sāriputto tikkhapañño bhikkhave sāriputto javanapañño bhikkhave sāriputto nibbedhikapañño bhikkhave sāriputto
anya-e0902n0:588_3: sāriputto bhikkhave aḍḍhamāsaṃ anupadadhammavipassanaṃ vipassatīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0902n0:588_4: āyasmato sāriputtassa dhammasenāpatissa anupadadhammavipassanā vitthārena pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:590_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena chabbisodhanasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:591_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:593_0: Pucchā – sappurisasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:594_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:596_0: Pucchā – sevitabbāsevitabbasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:597_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:599_0: Pucchā – bahudhātukasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:600_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:602_0: Pucchā – isigilisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:603_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante isigilismiṃ pabbate sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:605_0: Pucchā – mahācattārīsakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:606_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:608_0: Pucchā – ānāpānassatisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:609_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:609_2: therā bhante bhikkhū nave bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
anya-e0902n0:609_3: appekacce therā bhikkhū dasapi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
anya-e0902n0:609_4: appekacce therā bhikkhū vīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
anya-e0902n0:609_5: appekacce therā bhikkhū tiṃsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
anya-e0902n0:609_6: appekacce therā bhikkhū cattārīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
anya-e0902n0:609_7: te ca bhante navā bhikkhū therehi bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānā anusāsiyamānā uḷāraṃ pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ jānanti,
anya-e0902n0:611_0: Pucchā – kāyagatāsatisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:612_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:612_2: sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṃ upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:612_5: yāvañcidaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā vuttā mahānisaṃsā”ti,
anya-e0902n0:614_0: Pucchā – saṅkhārūpapattisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:615_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:616_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā saṅkhārūpapattiyo vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:617_1: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu saddhāya samannāgato hoti,
anya-e0902n0:617_6: tassa evaṃ hoti “aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya”nti
anya-e0902n0:617_7: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā saṅkhārūpapattiyo vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:619_0: Pucchā – cūḷasuññatasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:620_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:620_2: āyasmā bhante ānando sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ
anya-e0902n0:620_3: bhagavā sakkesu viharati nagarakaṃ nāma sakyānaṃ nigamo,
anya-e0902n0:620_4: tattha me bhante bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:620_6: suññatāvihārenāhaṃ ānanda etarahi bahulaṃ viharāmīti kacci metaṃ bhante sussutaṃ suggahitaṃ sumanasikataṃ sūpadhārita”nti,
anya-e0902n0:622_0: Pucchā – mahāsuññatasuttaṃ panāvuto bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:623_1: sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:623_2: āyasmā bhante ānando sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ghaṭāya sakkassa vihāre cīvarakammaṃ karoti,
anya-e0902n0:625_1: acchariyaabbhutasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:626_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:626_2: Sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṃ upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:626_5: Yatra hi nāma tathāgato atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte jānissati.
anya-e0902n0:628_0: Pucchā – bākulasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:629_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante acelaṃ kassapaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā bākulattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:631_0: Pucchā – dantabhūmisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:632_1: rājagahe bhante jayasenaṃ rājakumāraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:632_2: Jayaseno bhante rājakumāro aciravataṃ samaṇuddesaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bho aggivessana
anya-e0902n0:632_3: idha bhikkhu appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto phuseyya cittassa ekaggata”nti,
anya-e0902n0:633_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā aciravatassa samaṇuddesassa samassāsetvā dhammadesanānayo pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:634_2: yaṃ taṃ nekkhammena ñātabbaṃ nekkhammena daṭṭhabbaṃ nekkhammena pattabbaṃ nekkhammena sacchikātabbaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:634_3: taṃ vata jayaseno rājakumāro kāmamajjhe vasanto kāme paribhuñjanto kāmavitakkehi khajjamāno kāmapariḷāhena
anya-e0902n0:634_4: pariḍayhamāno kāmapariyosanāya ussuko ussati vā dakkhati vā sacchi vā karissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti
anya-e0902n0:634_5: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato aciravatassa samaṇuddesassa samassāsetvā,
anya-e0902n0:634_6: seyyathāpissu aggivessana dve hatthidammā vā assadammāvā godammā vā sudantā suvinītāti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0902n0:635_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavā dve upamāyo dassetvā tatuttari dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍheti.
anya-e0902n0:636_1: seyyathāpi aggivessana rājākhattiyo muddhāvasitto nāgavanikaṃ āmantetīti evamādinā bhante bhagavā uttaripi dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍhesi.
anya-e0902n0:638_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena bhūmijasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:639_1: rājagahe bhante jayasenaṃ rājakumāraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:639_2: jayaseno bhante rājakumāro āyasmantaṃ bhūmijaṃ etadavoca “santi bho bhūmija eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino
anya-e0902n0:639_11: Idha bhoto bhūmijassa satthā kiṃvādī kimakkhāyī”ti tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:640_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā āyasmato bhūmijattherassa taṃ byākaraṇaṃ samanujānitvā tatuttari dhammadesanānayo paripūretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:641_1: taggha tvaṃ bhūmija evaṃ puṭṭho evaṃ byākaramāno vuttavādī ceva me hosi,
anya-e0902n0:641_3: evamādinā bhante bhagavatā āyasmato bhūmijassa taṃ vacanaṃ samanujānitvā “yehi kehici bhūmija samaṇā
anya-e0902n0:641_4: vā brāhmaṇā vā micchādiṭṭhino micchāsaṅkappā micchāvācā micchākammantā micchāājīvā micchāvāyāmā micchāsatī
anya-e0902n0:641_7: abhabbā phalassa adhigamāyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā āyasmato bhūmijassa uttari desanānayo paripūretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:643_0: Pucchā – anuruddhasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:644_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante pañcakaṅgaṃ thapatiṃ ārabbha āyasmatā anuruddhattherena bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:644_2: pañcakaṅgo bhante thapati āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ etadavoca “idha maṃ bhante therā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0902n0:644_4: ekacce therā evamāhaṃsu ‘mahaggataṃ gahapati cetovimuttiṃ bhāvehī”ti,
anya-e0902n0:644_5: yā cāyaṃ bhante appamāṇā cetovimutti yā ca mahaggatā cetovimutti,
anya-e0902n0:644_6: ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca,
anya-e0902n0:644_7: udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nānanti” tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:646_0: Pucchā – upakkilesasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:647_0: Vissajjanā – pācīnavaṃsadāye bhante āyasmantaṃ anuruddhattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:649_0: Pucchā – bālapaṇḍitasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:650_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:651_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni ca bālassa diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhadomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:652_1: tīṇimāni bhikkhave bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni bālanimittāni bālāpadānāni.
anya-e0902n0:652_3: Idha bhikkhave bālo duccintitacintī ca hoti dubbhāsitabhāsī ca dukkaṭakammakārī cāti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0902n0:652_4: tattha bhagavatā bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni ca bālassa diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhadomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:653_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālassa samparāyo ca tattha niraye bālassa dukkhadomanassapaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:654_1: sa kho so bhikkhave bālo kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā
anya-e0902n0:654_2: kāyassa bhedāparaṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0902n0:654_3: bālassa samparāyo ca tattha ca bālassa niraye dukkhadomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:655_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālassa tiracchānayoniyaṃ dukkhadomanassapaṭisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:656_1: santi bhikkhave tiracchānagatā pāṇā tiṇabhakkhā te allānipi tiṇāni sukkhānipi tiṇāni dantullehakaṃ khādantīti
anya-e0902n0:656_2: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā bālassa tiracchānayoniyaṃ dukkhadomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:657_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālena sakiṃ vinipātagatena puna manussattadullabhatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:658_1: seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso ekacchiggalaṃ yugaṃ mahāsamudde pakkhipeyya,
anya-e0902n0:658_2: tamenaṃ puratthimo vāto pacchimena saṃhareyyāti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā bālena sakiṃ vinipātagatena puna manussattassa dullabhatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:659_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālassa kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgatassapi dukkhabahulatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:660_1: sa kho so bhikkhave bālo sace kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgacchatīti evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:660_2: bhante tattha bhagavatā bālassa kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgatassapi dukkhabahulatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:661_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni ca paṇḍitassa diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:662_1: tīṇimāni bhikkhave paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni paṇḍitanimittāni paṇḍitāpadānāni.
anya-e0902n0:662_3: Idha bhikkhave paṇḍito sucintitacintī ca hoti subhāsitabhāsī ca sukatakammakārī cāti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0902n0:663_0: Paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni ca diṭṭheva dhamme paṇḍitassa sukhasomanassapaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:664_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa samparāyo ca tattha sagge sukhasomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:665_1: sa kho so bhikkhave paṇḍito kāyena sucaritaṃ caritvā vācāya manasā sucaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ
anya-e0902n0:665_2: maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa samparāyo ca sagge
anya-e0902n0:666_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgatassapi sukhabahulatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:667_1: sa kho so bhikkhave paṇḍito sace kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgacchati,
anya-e0902n0:667_2: yāni tāni uccākulāni khattiyamahāsālakulaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāsālakulaṃ vā gahapatimahāsālakulaṃ vā tathārūpe
anya-e0902n0:667_3: kule paccājāyatīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena
anya-e0902n0:669_2: sammāsambuddhena cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:670_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante subhaṃ māṇavaṃ todeyyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:670_2: Subho bhante māṇavo todeyyaputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0902n0:670_3: yena manussānaṃyeva sataṃ manussabhūtānaṃ dissanti hīnappaṇītatā.
anya-e0902n0:670_4: Dissanti hi bho gotama manussā appāyukā,
anya-e0902n0:670_18: Ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0902n0:670_19: yena manussānaṃyeva sataṃ manussabhūtānaṃ dissanti hīnappaṇītatā”ti tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:671_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ dīghāyukaappāyukasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:672_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā pāṇātipātī hoti,
anya-e0902n0:672_2: luddo lohitapāṇi hatapahate niviṭṭho adayāpanno pāṇabhūtesūti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā appāyukadīghāyukasaṃvattanakāni
anya-e0902n0:673_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ appābādhabavhābādhasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:674_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā sattānaṃ viheṭṭhakajātiko hoti pāṇinā vā leḍḍunāvā daṇḍenavā satthena
anya-e0902n0:674_2: vāti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ appābādhabavhābādhasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:675_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:676_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo,
anya-e0902n0:676_2: appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patiṭṭhiyati,
anya-e0902n0:676_3: kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukarotīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:677_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ mahesakkha appesakkhasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:678_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā issāmanako hoti,
anya-e0902n0:678_2: paralābhasakkāra garukāra mānanavandana pūjāsu issati upadussati issaṃ bandhatīti evamādinā bhante tattha
anya-e0902n0:678_3: bhagavatā sattānaṃ appesakkhamahesakkhasaṃvattanakāni kammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:679_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā mahābhogaappabhogasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:680_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā na dātā hoti,
anya-e0902n0:680_2: samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vattaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandha vilepanaṃ seyyavasathapadīpeyyanti evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:680_3: bhante tattha bhagavatā mahābhogaappabhogasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:681_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ uccākulīna nīcakulīnasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:682_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā thaddho hoti atimāni abhivādetabbaṃ na abhivādeti,
anya-e0902n0:682_8: pūjetabbaṃ na pūjetīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ uccākulīna nīcakulīnasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:683_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ mahāpaññaduppaññasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:684_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā na paripucchitā hoti “kiṃ bhante kusalaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:684_7: Kiṃ me karīyamānaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti,
anya-e0902n0:684_8: kiṃ vā pana me karīyamānaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:686_0: Pucchā – indriyabhāvanāsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:687_1: gajaṅgalāyaṃ bhante uttaraṃ nāma māṇavaṃ pārāsiviyantevāsiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:687_2: uttaro bhante māṇavo pārāsiviyantevāsī bhagavatā puṭṭho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “idha bho gotama cakkhunā rūpaṃ na passati,
anya-e0902n0:687_4: Evaṃ kho bho gotama deseti pārāsiviyo brāhmaṇo sāvakānaṃ indriyabhāvana”nti.
